item.description:
We're gonna do a warm up for the Falmouth to Edgartown Bike Ride... Dust off your bikes, don your spandex and let's hit the trails !

There are a couple of trails. Each are about an hour each. Whaddya say? Who's with me?  Then maybe lunch at the BBQ joint down the street.

Paved trails this time... they do have dirt trails and feel free to bring your mountain bike for side trips or an extra ride after but I figured, for the group, we'd stick to the paved areas this time...

Here's my number in case you need it.... 508-479-7690
item.how_to_find_us: Look For My Blue Toyota Sienna Van with the Bike Rack

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Bike Ride - Myles Standish State Forest.
